pullRequest.title: Forward Content-Encoding header OKAPI-936
pullRequest.bodyText: Fix for OKAPI-936 Request logging can send compressed data to the filter. Until now only the Content-Type was forwarded from request-response pipeline.. request-only, headers should NOT forward this as the response is thrown away.

nodes.bodyText: Seems you can combine those to one line request.headers().set(header, res.getHeader(header));
Consider to add a line to check non-existing gzip header .header("Content-Encoding", nullValue())
